In the heart of a bustling Gurgaon neighborhood is a clinic called Upchaar Wellness that was not just a place for healing but a sanctuary for those in need of understanding and compassionate care. 
This is where I met Dr. Rajiva Gupta , an internal medicine doctor whose reputation for excellence was well known throughout the community.

As, I made my way to the clinic, a second time in seven months feeling a mix of anxiety and hope. My health had been a rollercoaster for months, with symptoms that seemed to confound everyone I'd consulted. As I stepped into the warm, inviting reception area, a sense of calm began to wash over me, a precursor to the exceptional experience that awaited.

Dr. Gupta greeted me with a smile that felt both professional and genuinely kind, an amalgamation of qualities not often found in tandem. From the outset, it was clear that he was a listener, a trait I would soon learn was the bedrock of his practice. He didn't rush through the consultation. Instead, he took his time, ensuring that every word I said was heard and every concern I had was addressed.

The consultation room was a reflection of Dr. Gupta’s approach to medicine: organized, serene, and equipped with the latest technology, yet it felt as comfortable as a living room. As we discussed my health, I was struck by his methodical yet empathetic approach. He wove together my medical history, symptoms, and concerns with the skill of a master storyteller, making complex medical information understandable and less intimidating.

Dr. Gupta’s diagnosis and tests that he recommended were thorough, backed by a clear explanation and a detailed plan for my path forward. He answered all my questions with patience and an evident depth of knowledge, making me feel involved in my treatment plan. His approach was not just about addressing the symptoms but understanding the person behind them, a holistic approach that was both refreshing and reassuring.

As the visit came to a close, Dr. Gupta shared a few words of encouragement that felt tailor-made for my situation. It wasn't just his medical expertise that left an impact; it was his remarkable ability to connect on a human level, making me feel seen and understood.

Leaving the clinic that day, I felt a renewed sense of hope. My journey to recovery was just beginning, but I knew I had found a doctor in Dr. Gupta  who was not just a physician but a trusted ally.

This experience wasn't just about a medical consultation; it was a testament to the power of compassionate care. I only believe in holistic treatments with an allopathic diagnosis. Living in the US over the last 18 years have made me very aware of how chronic conditions are mostly treated with  medications which could leave a patient dependent on those for life.

Dr. Gupta exemplified what it means to be a remarkable internal medicine doctor - a beacon of knowledge, empathy, and support. In a world where the human aspect of healthcare often feels overshadowed by the clinical, my visit to Dr. Gupta was a poignant reminder of its importance, a story of a doctor and a patient, and the profound impact of truly being heard.

Therefore it is helpful for the doctor and in the interest of the patient for the details to be mentioned on the chat.  There may be back to back consultation on the Practo in successive slots because of which immediate delivery of the prescription may not be feasible.
